channel.title: Magic spells killing full health
channel.description:
1. i just made my new server on hamachi, phonescape based and im having some problems with it, first of all people are in a fight at ghorrock somebody randomly mages the other and kills them at like full health without even a hit bubble, if you know how to fix this and what code i can deal with it easily.
2.when people die they don't always go to varrock they stay where they died they get stripped of their items and stand there, or they die go to varrock and come back but even if i can see their items when they die (i didn't kill that person) and nobody picks the stuff up they can't see their own stuff.
if you know the coding wrong to fix this tell me.
